reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: MFA's Support to Finnish Water Forum

description.narrative: Finnish Water Forum (FWP) project will be established in order to promote the achievement of internationally agreed Millennium Development Goals and to make sure that also Finnish water experts will be able to do their part. The Ministry for Foreign Affair s will cover 40 % of the total costs (which support developing countries and are according to ODA-criteria). This money will be used for activities which support the developing world. FWF will begin in the first half of year 2009 and will last from 2009 to 2012. Main focus of the FWF will cover the following themes: water and sanitation, water and environment, water and society, water-related problems in the developing world, climate change and water and Integrated Water Resource Management (IWRM).
